quote: One man may hit the mark, another blunder; but heed not these distinctions. Only from the alliance of the one, working with and through the other, are great things born.
author: Antoine de Sainte-Exupery

quote: Now is no time to think of what you do not have. Think of what you can do with what there is.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: Let us be grateful to people who make us happy; they are the charming gardeners who make our souls blossom.
author: Marcel Proust

quote: As we express our gratitude, we must never forget that the highest appreciation is not to utter words, but to live by them.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: You cannot do a kindness too soon because you never know how soon it will be too late.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: We should all be thankful for those people who rekindle the inner spirit.
author: Albert Schweitzer

quote: Feeling grateful or appreciative of someone or something in your life actually attracts more of the things that you appreciate and value into your life.
author: Northrup Christiane

quote: What you truly acknowledge truly is yours. Invite your heart to be grateful and your thank yous will be heard even when you don’t use words.
author: Pavithra Mehta

quote: The essence of all beautiful art, all great art, is gratitude.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Let us be kinder to one another.
author: Aldous Huxley

quote: A grateful mind is a great mind which eventually attracts to itself great things.
author: Plato

quote: To speak gratitude is courteous and pleasant, to enact gratitude is generous and noble, but to live gratitude is to touch Heaven.
author: Johannes Gaertner

quote: When I started counting my blessings, my whole life turned around.
author: Willie Nelson

quote: To live a life fulfilled reflect on the things you have with gratitude.
author: Jaren Davis

quote: Be grateful, not only for others, but for yourself
author: Unknown

quote: What can you do right now to turn your life around?? Gratitude
author: The Secret

quote: If the only prayer you ever say in your entire life is thank you, it will be enough.
author: Meister Eckhart

quote: Gratitude: A lively sense of future benefit.
author: Unknown

quote: I still miss those I loved who are no longer with me but I find I am grateful for having loved them. The gratitude has finally conquered the loss.
author: Rita Mae Brown

quote: Breathe. Let go. And remind yourself that this very moment is the only one you know you have for sure.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: The smallest thanks is always worth more than the effort it takes to give it.
author: Unknown

quote: Reflect upon your present blessings — of which every man has many — not on your past misfortunes, of which all men have some.
author: Charles Dickens

quote: It is necessary, then, to cultivate the habit of being grateful for every good thing that comes to you, and to give thanks continuously. And because all things have contributed to your advancement, you should include all things in your gratitude.
author: Wallace D. Wattles

quote: There is always, always, always something to be thankful for.
author: Unknown

quote: Thou who hast given so much to me, give me one more thing… a grateful heart!
author: George Herbert

quote: In all affairs it’s a healthy thing now and then to hang a question mark on the things you have long taken for granted.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: They are not poor that have little, but they that desire much. The richest man, whatever his lot, is the one who’s content with his lot.
author: Dutch Proverb

quote: If you can’t reward then you should thank.
author: Arabic Proverb

quote: Gratitude is riches. Complaint is poverty.
author: Unknown

quote: Breathe. Let go. And remind yourself that this very moment is the only one you know you have for sure.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Stop thinking gratitude as a buy product of your circumstances and start thinking of it as a world view.
author: Bryan Robles

quote: Not what we say about our blessings, but how we use them, is the true measure of our thanksgiving.
author: W.T. Purkiser

quote: The deepest craving of human nature is the need to be appreciated.
author: William James

quote: Things turn out best for people who make the best of the way things turn out.
author: John Wooden

quote: Some people are always grumbling because roses have thorns; I am thankful that thorns have roses.
author: Alphonse Karr

quote: …it is not joy that makes us grateful; it is gratitude that makes us joyful.
author: David Steindl-Rast

quote: If you haven’t all the things you want, be grateful for the things you don’t have that you wouldn’t want.
author: Unknown

quote: Gratitude unlocks the fullness of life. It turns what we have into enough, and more. It turns denial into acceptance, chaos into order, confusion into clarity…Gratitude makes sense of our past, brings peace for today and creates a vision for tomorrow.
author: Melodie Beattie

quote: When eating bamboo sprouts, remember the man who planted them.
author: Chinese Proverb

quote: Gratitude is happiness double by wonder.
author: G.K. Chesterton

quote: In our daily lives, we must see that it is not happiness that makes us grateful, but the gratefulness that makes us happy.
author: Albert Clarke

quote: Gratitude is the most exquisite form of courtesy.
author: Jacques Maritain

quote: Maybe being grateful means recognizing what you have for what it is. Appreciating small victories. Admiring the struggle it takes to simply be human…At the end of the day, the fact that we have the courage to still be standing is reason enough to celebrate.
author: Meredith Grey

quote: You have no cause for anything but gratitude and joy.
author: Buddha

quote: Reflect upon your present blessings, of which every man has plenty; not on your past misfortunes of which all men have some.
author: Charles Dickens

quote: Silent gratitude isn’t much use to anyone.
author: G.B. Stern

quote: Feeling gratitude and not expressing it is like wrapping a present and not giving it.
author: William Ward

quote: There is a calmness to a life lived in gratitude, a quiet joy.
author: Ralph Blum

quote: You won’t be happy with more until you’re happy with what you’ve got.
author: Viki King

quote: Live your life so that the fear of death can never enter your heart. When you arise in the morning, give thanks for the morning light. Give thanks for your life and strength. Give thanks for your food and for the joy of living. And if perchance you see no reason for giving thanks, rest assured the fault is in yourself.
author: Tecumseh Shawnee Chief

quote: Happiness is the realization of God in the heart. Happiness is the result of praise and thanksgiving, of faith, of acceptance; a quiet tranquil realization of the love of God.
author: White Eagle
